text: Truly moved seeing @drsanjaygupta & Dr. Valerie Montgomery-Rice receive the #Covid19 #Vaccine on @NewDay w/@JohnBerman & @EricaRHill: ‘this feels historic; challenging year- sign of hope. Keep wearing masks, distancing’ Agree! Now, #Relief4Charities to keep the hope coming PLS🙏🏽 https://t.co/4ePywrpdSL
